references.formattedCitation: Smith, Catherine Delano, Derek Gadd, Nigel Mills, and Bryan Ward Perkins. “Luni and the Ager Lunensis: The Rise and Fall of a Roman Town and Its Territory.” Papers of the British School at Rome 41 (1986): 81–146. http://www.jstor.org/stable/40310830.

description: Luna (the modern Luni) is an ancient settlement of Liguria. It was re-founded by the Romans as a colonial settlement in 177 BC.
